__e: I... it... it was like time stood still and I was outside my body and I am watching myself,
I've had this feeling for a long time... and it's like I'm standing outside myself... watching me do things I don't wanna do, you know?
At one point, I was on the outside of my body watching myself be amazing.
The murderer was about to get rid of the body and heard the knock and became frightened.
And from the amount of postmortem predation, I'd say she was in the water for eight to ten hours before you pulled her out.
It's so strange hating a part of your body, being mad at it for not being able to do what you want it to.
